>
[Petrification Cannon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1168)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 155 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Built from the taxidermic body of a [basilisk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=44), a petrification cannon functions as a _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [double-barreled musket](/Weapons.aspx?ID=198)_. A _petrification cannon_ can be activated to fire a beam of energy that transforms flesh into stone.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** A beam of coiling energy leaps from the _petrification cannon_ at a target within 60 feet. The target must attempt a Fortitude save against DC 34 with the effects of [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123).

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the body of a basilisk.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Petrification Cannon
